entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8 except temperature steady near zero over western sections.
